values: why oh why oh why do I put myself through the things I do...  I am not feeling "myself" and I really don't know how to pull my head out of my ass.
I hate when I hate myself.. and when I'm positive that I'm not good enough.

So....  I think I'm going to be voluntarily removing myself from the lives of my family.  My wonderful, sweet family, who I have always considered supportive, loving and caring.  The family that is supposed to have my back always.  The family that I always felt SOOO lucky to have, because they accepted my queerness... and always embraced my friends and lovers. 

Except they haven't.  And I was faced with that cold, harsh reality today.  G and I are supposed to go to my sister's house for thanksgiving.  We have G's niece... and need to drive her to Fresno on Wednesday... so, my master plan was to drive her home to fresno.. and then just keep heading to Sacramento and spend the night with my mom.  Ellie, G and I... spending the night with my mom.  Ok.  Shouldn't be a big deal.  

I was talking to my mom on facebook.. and I said... Hey, can G, Ellie and I spend the night on Wednesday so we can just be there on Thursday morning, instead of having to take that drive Thursday am?  Sure, she says.. I'd rather not have Ellie on my furniture.. and you and G have to sleep in separate rooms.  

Wait, what??  

I'm going to be 40 years old next year.  I'm a grown ass woman. But, I have to sleep in a separate room than the person I'm coupled with?  Are you fucking kidding me?

So, I say... are you serious?  Would you make Donna and Scott (my sister and Brotherinlaw) sleep apart?  

"Well, No", she says...  "they are married".

Yes mom.. I know... but, I can't get married in the state of California.  

"Lets not get into this... lets just have a nice time.  You are more than welcome to stay". 

Um??   Lets not get into this?? Lets not get into a conversation where you are faced with perpetuating the minimalization of my relationships and love?  I don't get enough of that in the world??? In society?? I have to deal with it in my own family????  Are you kidding me??

I am SOOOO angry.  I have been gone for 10 years... and only been back for two. I started thinking... maybe the reason they have been supportive is because, really, they haven't had to face it.  I came home for weekends at a time... spent time in hotels... before that, I was local, so never had to spend the night with anyone in my family.  And now... I'm bringing someone around more often... and they have to face seeing us hold hands, pecks on the cheeks, and god forbid, spend the night in the spare bedroom.

So, I have to make a decision...  Do I allow my family to reduce my relationship to a "pal" who hangs out in different bedrooms, just to keep the peace?  Or do I stand firm in my anger and say no... if you want to see me... you have to see ALL of me.  You don't get to pick and choose the parts of me you don't want to deal with.  It's all or nothing.

Looks like thanksgiving will be G, Ellie and I at home.

I have a few "REAL" friends...  friends that I know would have my back no matter what...  those friends who I could call at 2am and ask for anything.... even if its just to sit on the other end of the phone and listen to me breathe because I was going through something.

I have a big handful of "folks".  People I hang out with... really enjoy their company.  Laugh with, drink with... just generally chill with and have a great time.

My family loves me unconditionally.  Even when they don't agree with me. 

I also have a group of people who I wonder about.  People who claim to be "friends", but they are the kind I need to wear kevlar with... the ones who grill me for information, and I wonder when they are going to use that information against me later.  Or if nothing else, I wonder if they are listening to me just to get their "drama fix".    

I am working on eliminating that group of people from my life.
are going to send me back to school, I'm pretty sure.    Scary shit.
sometimes they do... and sometimes they don't.  Right now...  I feel like I seriously need to make some changes in my life.
of, I don't feel good right now.
How freaking COOL was that?!   =)   I love my life..  I love him.
after a completely CRAPPY day.... I had SUCH a great evening... for real.

I wrote "feeling empty" on my facebook page a little while ago...   I was, in fact, feeling empty.  I have not had a good day today...   I'm feeling very lost... and disconnected from my self for a variety of reasons.   My facebook is my facebook.  Even though its just a damn facebook page.. it's still mine, isn't it?

So, what do I get in response to "feeling empty"... I get a few very kind comments from my friends, and an instant message from my sister "Why did you just post that you are feeling empty on your page?"   Because, I am in fact, feeling empty... I tell her.   "Well, why do you want everyone to know that... I mean... why do you post stuff that is so SAD all the time?"

The conversation went downhill from there.... I told her that I just wasn't as HAPPY all the time like she was... I don't like in a 2 freakin million dollar house which is paid off... with horses in the backyard... and don't have the money to spend 20K a year to send my kid to private school.   And buy a 4,000 bike to trail ride with... blah blah blah blah.  My life just isn't that CHARMED.  

So, the next part of the conversation went like  "you know... maybe if you would date men... you wouldn't be so sad all the time!  You date manly women anyway"  

Wait, WHAT!????????????????      I have been OUT since 1992.. I mean, 1992 FOR CRYING OUT LOUD...    My family has been UBER supportive... never a rude comment... always accepted whomever I brought home.. and now this!??   WTF

I'm still feeling empty for the same reasons I was earlier... but, seriously.. I'm PISSED.
I'm at work... but, I really want to be home.. cuddled up under the blankies with G.   It was sooo warm and peaceful this morning.....
he is sick sick sick sick sick.....  poor baby.  =(

I'm seriously feeling like something is wrong with me...I just FLIPPED out over not being able to go to DSW???

WTF???  I have 150 pairs of shoes. And, NONE of them are perfect for this ONE outfit...but, I start crying over it???   Seriously!??????

I need a drink

this is not going to be a good day... not at all. I'm REALLY trying.   I go between being thrilled with my life... and in the next moment, wanting to take the bridge.  I'm not normally so moody., so, WTF?!     Is this how it's supposed to be?   For some reason, I think not.  

Ugh..

love, fear of judgment, shame......

these are not good combinations.

sick to my stomach...  depressed... sad...  but totally, 100%, brutally, angry.

I hope it lasts... for real.

the truth is.... 

I love freely, to my detriment.  And I can't figure out how to stop doing that.  But, I'm not really sure I want to.  I have felt some of the most true love I think any human being has ever experienced.  It's almost not fair to the rest of the planet.  Those poor souls who have never had such a full heart.   the downside....  heartbreak.  When you love as deeply and purely as I do....  the heart gets raw....   open.... and vulnerable.    And, I give that love freely whether the person actually deserves it, or not.    And.....  whether they love me back as purely.

I have to hope that at some level, they do or did.  I hope that, even though I have to suffer pain when it ends..... that I am able to give joy to others..... and gain some confidence that the joy and happiness was true on both sides.   And, not just an act to get what they want.

there is a shift in the universe

I need to start writing again.....  this is the best place to do it..   I don't think any of my people come here anymore... and no one I have in my life now really knows this old journal even exists.   I don't want to "protect" posts right now... for some reason....   I need to make them public.  I'm not even sure why.  

what the fuck am I doing, anyway?

what to write when I'm feeling like this.......................

again.

When you first left me I was wanting more
But you were fucking that girl next door, what cha do that for (what cha do that for)
When you first left me I didn't know what to say
I never been on my own that way, just sat by myself all day

I was so lost back then
But with a little help from my friends
I found a light in the tunnel at the end
Now you're calling me up on the phone
So you can have a little whine and a moan
And it's only because you're feeling alone

At first when I see you cry,
yeah it makes me smile, yeah it makes my smile
At worst I feel bad for a while,
but then I just smile I go ahead and smile

Whenever you see me you say that you want me back
And I tell you it don't mean jack, no it don't mean jack
I couldn't stop laughing, no I just couldn't help myself
See you messed up my mental health I was quite unwell

I was so lost back then
But with a little help from my friends
I found a light in the tunnel at the end
Now you're calling me up on the phone
So you can have a little whine and a moan
And it's only because you're feeling alone

At first when I see you cry,
yeah it makes me smile, yeah it makes my smile
At worst I feel bad for a while,
but then I just smile I go ahead and smile

lalalalalalalalalalalalalalalala lalala

At first when I see you cry,
yeah it makes me smile, yeah it makes my smile
At worst I feel bad for a while,
but then I just smile I go ahead and smile

So much packing to do... its a amazing how much stuff a person can accumulate in a short period of time...  was loading all of the suits into a wardrobe box yesterday.... and saw that dress....  

On another note... I put an offer in on a house yesterday... sight unseen... pictures only...  but beautiful... my sister is going to see it for me tomorrow.  Its a steal for the bay area... and reminds me a lot of the house in Pittsburgh, only smaller and frame instead of stone... but has the same old character...  we'll see if I get it.
Leave tomorrow for SFO for the weekend...    Can't wait...

It is absofreakinglutely gorgeous in Chicago right now.  I have all of my windows and balcony doors open.... and the air is blowing through... Darcy is perched up on the couch with her nose pointed to the door.   I went walking on the beach last night for the first time since moving to Chicago..... and seriously... If I didnt see it called a LAKE on a map... I would never believe that wasn't a freakin ocean.

I love it here.

well... we are home from the doctor...  it turns out she had five tumors in her mouth... not just the two we knew about.  She is home... very groggy... and certainly sore... but, still wagging her little butt.  we are in for a quiet evening and I'm having the dog walker come extra times this week.   I'm so glad she is home.

Biopsy results on Friday.

Well....  she is at the hospital.  I dropped her off and came home for a little while, because they aren't going to even start the surgery for a couple of hours.  I am going to try to stay busy for a few hours and then go and sit and wait for her.....

She was such a good girl....  just wagged her little butt at me... and walked down the hall with the nurse.

I need a damn drink or something.
Darcy is sick....     I think a trip to the emergency room might be in order later if she doesn't start feeling/looking better.

Spring has settled in Chicago.  It was 72 degrees (according to my car) when I was driving home tonight. Its amazing how it can be soooo cold and then soooo not.  I want to try to make it to the burgh pretty soon to visit friends and loved ones....  I wish I had made it back there more often in the past 9 months....

Sometimes I can't believe I've been gone for 9 damn months already.  Wow... that's a damn pregnancy.   I'm going back to California pretty soon to visit family... and my mom wants to come visit in June.  Should be interesting showing my mom around my 'hood.  She will be appalled by the big city.

All I know is.... I love this city...and I'm wearing a windbreaker to work tomorrow... and hanging the wool up !!

the smell of leather

the sting... the welts... the bruises... the marks.. the connection...

the power exchange

some people may not understand... but, I know some that do.

I thought I was done years ago...  but, I'm starting to miss it.

to delete my journal... I hardly write anymore... and...  I wonder what value it has at times to post personal things to a public forum.  Do I need to express my feelings, thoughts, love, hate, etc. to random people? If I love someone, what benefit does it give me to post it here?   Why wouldn't I just pick up the phone or send an email or whatever?   If I'm upset with someone...  I'm certainly not going to tell them here.  Does it make us feel validated because someone else is reading our thoughts?   

I'm just starting to wonder what we all get out of this.

according to weather.com

it is currently 2 degrees.... with a windchill of -21

what the FUCK was I thinking.................

I wonder... how much of what a person says is the truth.  Is it the actual truth, or what they believe to the true at that particular moment?   When someone says something... do you count on it being true or that there will be follow through in connection with their statements?   Should a person take everything with many grains of salt... because likely, their feelings will either (a) change..or (b) weren't true in the first place?   Or, if you digest enough sodium to protect yourself and your heart... does that make you bitter?   

Just curious.
some people disappoint me so much.

Happy new year to all of my lovely friends.    If you know me... you know how I feel about you... so, no new years wishes probably need to be said... but, know that I'm thinking about you this evening... 

love

I feel like I have so much to think about... but none of it really matters.  I'm going through the motions of getting things accomplished, and am very excited about my life... and what is in store for me.    But, I was talking to a friend tonight about me, my life, my history, people I love and care about, and I realized how much I bury inside of myself sometimes.

I took today off to get stuff done... but, haven't made any progress.  It feels like a really great fall day outside... and I've watched two episodes of America's Next Top Model... and curled up on the couch with my poochy.   I wanted to get things done.. but, so far... I just don't feel like it.  Maybe I'll get some motivation later today....

Its a little on the balmy side today (my car read 36 degrees!)   So, I went out with a thermal & pullover...  shopping is fabulous during Christmas.  I love wandering around the stores and listening to the Christmas music.  


Yesterday was tense... if you haven't heard... there was a shooting in a highrise in downtown Chicago. I know some of my friends/loved ones have heard, because I received frantic voicemails and text messagaes yesterday.  As soon as people heard "shooting" and "law firm"... I guess there was some level of panic .  

Some crazy bastard who thought he was getting screwed over on his invention walked into a law firm and started shooting people.  That building is block from my office... and houses the train station I go to every day.  And, yesterday, I happened to bail out a little early... and happened to be walking by the station at the exact moment the police were arriving.  The ushered me quickly across the street.. and... immediately rerouted traffic away from the station.  I didn't know what was going on at that moment... but, found out a few minutes later.  I feel so bad for the families of the people that guy killed.  Four people dead... for literally no reason. How desperate must a person feel to do something like that?      What a shame.

welcome to Chicago......

Its FREEZING !!!!  I mean.. seriously... its freezing rain... the roads are a solid sheet of ice... and there is a prediction of 6-10 inches of snow tomorrow.  WTF did I get myself into !!!     Ha ha ha !!!!

I am actually totally digging it.  At least here when it snows, the city doesn't shut down !!!

Feeling warm and fuzzy.... 

I realize how much I miss my friends... but, I'm trying to refocus it on missing them and being happy about the amazing memories I have, instead of focusing on the sadness I feel without them. 

I am loving my life right now though....   Generally... my life pretty much fucking rocks... and I need to remind myself of that at times.  I love my job... I have found some amazing people in Chicago.   I have made some completely random contacts... that have... well, turned out really well.   I have a couple of amazing friends.  I am making enough money to be totally comfortable in a city that most people can't afford to be comfortable in.    I need to be thankful instead of feeling sad. 

Things change, people change, and so does geography.  That doesn't mean I don't long for my friends... my shopping days.. my nights out drinking... my days lounging... and various other unmentionable things with people I love and adore.   

Sometimes when I think about the experiences I've had in my life...  I have to kick myself for ever being depressed and fussy.  I'm one lucky lesbian.
